import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ScheduleAdd() { const history = useHistory(); const [scheduleData, setScheduleData] = useState({ express: "", bus: "", date: "", departureTime: "", arrivalTime: "", availableSeats: "", price: "", status: "active" }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setScheduleData({ ...scheduleData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically save to your backend console.log("New Schedule Data:", scheduleData); // Show success message and redirect alert("Schedule added successfully!"); history.push("/admin/schedules"); }; const handleCancel = () => { history.push("/admin/schedules"); }; return ( <>
